subject: Steroids
Law and Legislation
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Information emerged that Brian McNamee, Roger Clemens’s former trainer, had stated in a sworn deposition Thursday that he injected Clemens’s wife, Debbie, with H.G.H., at Clemens’s request.
snippet: Information emerged that Brian McNamee, Roger Clemens’s former trainer, had stated in a sworn deposition Thursday that he injected Clemens’s wife, Debbie, with H.G.H., at Clemens’s request.
